tuning_notes.breadth_weight: Increase to give more importance to market breadth (0-1)
tuning_notes.momentum_weight: Weight for momentum factor when available (0-1)
tuning_notes.extreme_thresholds: Percentages above which breadth is considered extreme
tuning_notes.neutral_zone: Range where market is considered neutral [min, max]
tuning_notes.weekly_bias_thresholds: Thresholds for determining weekly trading bias
